description: Join us for a behind the scenes visit to the new Green Logistics Centre housed in a recently refurbished arch in the heart of the Low Line in Bankside

events.name: Amandeep Kellay, Sustainable Travel Manager, Better Bankside

factsheet.heading: New Micro-Logistics Centre in Bankside a first for London
paragraphs: This will be a space where local businesses can consolidate their deliveries, reducing the number of polluting vehicle journeys in the neighbourhood. Businesses will be able to reduce costs by ordering items in bulk which will be stored in our Ewer Street arch and delivered by dedicated electric vehicles as required.

We will be able to receive items directly and businesses can check stock levels via an online system. A micro-logistics facility of this kind, accepting deliveries from any company and operating at a neighbourhood scale will be a first for London.
Join us for a behind the scenes overview of the facility.

images.title: Green Logistics facility within Ewer Street Arch
Render of facade of Ewer Street Arches

travel_info: Nearest tube: Borough, London Bridge, Blackfriars, Southwark
Nearest train: Waterloo (East), Waterloo, London Bridge, Blackfriars

name: Low Line - Green Logistics Centre
